mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inbody_records (user_id, height, weight, body_water, protein, mineral, body_fat, muscle_mass, muscle_body, muscle_left_arm, muscle_right_arm, muscle_left_leg, muscle_right_leg, bmi, body_fat_percent, measured_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{height}, #{weight}, #{bodyWater}, #{protein}, #{mineral}, #{bodyFat}, #{muscleMass}, #{muscleBody}, #{muscleLeftArm}, #{muscleRightArm}, #{muscleLeftLeg}, #{muscleRightLeg}, #{bmi}, #{bodyFatPercent}, NOW());
mapper.select: SELECT r.completed_at AS date, SUM(CASE WHEN e.id = 163 THEN rs.weight * (1 + (rs.count / 30)) ELSE 0 END) AS benchpress, SUM(CASE WHEN e.id = 27 THEN rs.weight * (1 + (rs.count / 30)) ELSE 0 END) AS squart, SUM(CASE WHEN e.id = 103 THEN rs.weight * (1 + (rs.count / 30)) ELSE 0 END) AS deadlift, SUM(rs.weight * rs.count) AS totalVolume, r.sum_time AS totalTime FROM routines r JOIN routine_details rd ON r.id = rd.routine_id JOIN routine_sets rs ON rd.id = rs.routine_detail_id JOIN exercises e ON rd.exercise_id = e.id WHERE r.user_id = #{userId} AND r.is_complete = TRUE AND r.completed_at IS NOT NULL AND rs.is_complete = TRUE AND e.id IN (27, 103, 163) GROUP BY r.completed_at, r.sum_time ORDER BY r.completed_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT r.id AS routineId, r.title AS routineName, r.due_date AS dueDate, r.is_complete AS isCompleted FROM routines r WHERE r.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY is_like DESC, due_date ASC
